sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RelatedListItemCandidateFilter</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>OOB: Implements extension point global.RelatedListItemCandidateFilter</description>
        <name>RelatedListItemCandidateFilter</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RelatedListItemCandidateFilter = Class.create();
RelatedListItemCandidateFilter.prototype = {
    initialize: function(tableName, parentFieldName, parentRecordSysId, referencedFieldName) {
		this.tableName = tableName;
		this.parentFieldName = parentFieldName;
		this.parentRecordSysId = parentRecordSysId;
		this.referencedFieldName = referencedFieldName;
    },
    getFilterQuery: function() {
       var selectedRecord = new GlideRecord(this.tableName);
        selectedRecord.addQuery(this.parentFieldName, this.parentRecordSysId);
        selectedRecord.query();
        var result = [];
        while (selectedRecord.next()) {
            result.push(selectedRecord.getValue(this.referencedFieldName));
        }
		
		if (result.length)
            return "sys_idNOT IN" + result.join(",");
		
        return "";
    },
	
	handles: function(thing){
		return thing == "DEFAULT";
	},

    type: 'RelatedListItemCandidateFilter'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-08 17:49:13</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3ded9b0f7707330022f7f4d2681061b8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RelatedListItemCandidateFilter</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Form" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.form">48054dc36de620100acb70b35343307f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3ded9b0f7707330022f7f4d2681061b8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-08 17:49:13</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>939</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
